title: Executive Order 11915-Abolishing the Energy Research and Development Advisory Council
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by the Constitution and Statutes of the United States, and as President of the United States of America, the Energy Research and Development Advisory Council established June 29, 1973, is hereby abolished and section 2 (4) of Executive Order No. 11827 of January 4, 1975, is hereby rescinded.
citation: Gerald R. Ford, Executive Order 11915-Abolishing the Energy Research and Development Advisory Council Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/268612
